modShortDescription: Well here it is Stallionsden's personal no block damage ever, no zombie jumping at you and each zombie giving you a bag each time you kill one.
modDescription:
Zombies destroying your base or your overnight accomodation. Zombies jumping from out of no where making you change your pants often. [Zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) making you work hard and not giving you anything in return. Well here it is Stallionsden’s personal no block damage ever, no zombie jumping at you and each zombie giving you a bag each time you kill one.

## Zombie Modifications With No Rage

Same as Zombie modifications but with no rage either.

## Changelog

Updated models to new models.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/Stallionsdens%20zombie%20modifications)** Zombie Modifications  
(Removed for further work) Zombie Modifications With No Rage

If you appreciate Stallionsden’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](http://paypal.me/AnthonyCar78).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19911-stallionsdens-and-valmars-a19-mod-thread/).

**Credits:** [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/), StompyNZ, Khelldon
